tickets.title: Auto Assignment Not Working
tickets.author: John Smith
tickets.description: I haven't received any auto assignments for the past 2 hours. I've checked my status and I'm set as 'Available'. My queue is empty but I know there are cases in the general pool. Please help troubleshoot why I'm not getting assignments.

tickets.title: Request to Block Cases from Specific Region
tickets.author: Ana Garcia
tickets.description: I need to stop receiving cases from the APAC region as I don't have the language capabilities to handle them effectively. Is there a way to update my assignment rules to exclude these cases?

tickets.title: Time Zone Update Required
tickets.author: Tej Kumar
tickets.description: I recently relocated to the EST time zone, but my working hours are still showing in PST. Need assistance updating my profile to reflect the correct time zone so my availability is properly tracked.

tickets.title: Microphone Issues in Support Portal
tickets.author: Max Mueller
tickets.description: My microphone stopped working in the support portal during customer calls. I've verified it works in other applications and system settings. This is affecting my ability to handle voice support tickets. Need urgent assistance.

tickets.title: Microphone and Auto Assignment
tickets.author: Olivia Brown
tickets.description: Having two critical issues: 1) My microphone isn't working in the support portal, though it works fine in other applications. 2) I'm not receiving any auto-assigned tickets despite being available for the last hour. My status is set to 'Available' but my queue remains empty even though there are tickets in the general pool. Both issues are severely impacting my ability to handle support cases.

tickets.title: Dashboard Not Loading
tickets.author: John Smith
tickets.description: My support dashboard is stuck on a loading screen and doesn't display any of my active cases. I've tried clearing my cache, switching browsers, and even using an incognito window, but the issue persists. I need assistance as I cannot track ongoing customer issues.

tickets.title: Case Reassignment Request
tickets.author: Ana Garcia
tickets.description: I was assigned a case that involves advanced API debugging, which is beyond my expertise. I’ve attempted some initial troubleshooting, but I believe this would be better handled by an engineer with API experience. Can this case be reassigned to the appropriate team?

tickets.title: Delayed Case Notifications
tickets.author: Tej Kumar
tickets.description: I'm experiencing a significant delay in case notifications. When new cases are assigned, I don't receive the notification for 10-15 minutes. This has led to longer response times, which negatively impacts our SLA. Please investigate and resolve this issue.

tickets.title: Support Portal Freezing Intermittently
tickets.author: Max Mueller
tickets.description: The support portal keeps freezing at random intervals, requiring me to refresh the page frequently. It happens particularly when switching between cases or updating notes. This is severely slowing down my workflow. Is this a known issue?

tickets.title: Request for Elevated Access
tickets.author: Olivia Brown
tickets.description: I need additional access permissions to view full customer account histories for troubleshooting. Currently, I get an 'Access Denied' error when attempting to retrieve past interactions. Please grant me the necessary permissions or direct me to the right process to request them.

tickets.title: Microwave is Broken
tickets.author: John Smith
tickets.description: My microwave is model H200 and it is flashing green and not heating up. I need to get this fixed as soon as possible.

tickets.title: Live Chat Not Receiving Messages
tickets.author: Ana Garcia
tickets.description: Customers are reporting that they're sending messages through live chat, but I don't see anything on my end. I've confirmed with multiple users that they are actively sending messages, but my chat window remains blank. Please investigate why chat messages aren't being received.

tickets.title: Frequent Logouts from Support Portal
tickets.author: Tej Kumar
tickets.description: Every 30 minutes, I am logged out of the support portal even though I select 'Keep me signed in'. This started happening after the most recent security update. It’s disruptive as I have to log back in constantly throughout the day.

tickets.title: Voice Support Dropping Calls
tickets.author: Max Mueller
tickets.description: I'm noticing that customer calls randomly drop after a few minutes. My internet connection is stable, and this happens across different customer interactions. It’s impacting my ability to resolve issues efficiently. Could this be a system-side problem?

tickets.title: Performance Metrics Not Updating
tickets.author: Olivia Brown
tickets.description: The performance dashboard has not updated since yesterday, and it’s not reflecting the cases I’ve closed today. I need accurate metrics to track my resolution rate. Please check if there is a system-wide delay in performance updates.

tickets.title: Cannot Attach Files to Cases
tickets.author: John Smith
tickets.description: I am unable to attach files to support cases. When I try to upload a file, the system either freezes or throws an 'Upload Failed' error. This is making it difficult to share logs and screenshots with customers.

tickets.title: Inconsistent Auto-Assignment Behavior
tickets.author: Ana Garcia
tickets.description: Auto-assignment is working inconsistently. Some days, I receive cases back-to-back, and other times I go hours without any assignments despite being available. I need clarity on whether my assignment settings are configured correctly.

tickets.title: Email Notifications Not Working
tickets.author: Tej Kumar
tickets.description: I'm not receiving email notifications when customers update cases or when new cases are assigned to me. This has led to missed follow-ups. Please check if there's an issue with the email alert system.

tickets.title: Case Escalation Not Functioning
tickets.author: Max Mueller
tickets.description: When I try to escalate cases to Tier 2 support, the system does not register the escalation request. The button is unresponsive, and the case remains in my queue. This is preventing customers from getting timely assistance.

tickets.title: Case Resolution Button Missing
tickets.author: John Smith
tickets.description: I'm unable to mark cases as resolved because the 'Resolve Case' button has disappeared from my interface. This issue started occurring after the latest system update. Without this functionality, I can't properly close out completed cases.
